From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

"No one threatens a Decepticon on my watch." Motormaster said furiously,
as he suddenly stopped, and then transforming, so he stood right in fron
of Slaughter. He looked him in the eye, snarled, then sent a fist
straight to his face.
